U: S. Rep. Gwen Moore's characterization of McConnell's remark, stating that he credits Republicans for a recovery because they had taken control of the Senate only "days ago."
Mitch McConnell: s statement on the Senate floor acknowledging that the recent economic uptick appears to coincide with the expectation of a new Republican Congress.
